General.Name: Enjoei S.A
General.Description: Enjoei S.A. operates a marketplace platform for the purchase and sale of used products. The company provides products for girls, boys, and kids, including accessories, clothes, beauty products, shoes, and bags, as well as furniture, decoration and antique products, home appliances, lighting and kitchen products, computers, tablets, music, telephony, photography, video games, TVs and displays, and other products. It sells its products online. The company was formerly known as Enjoei.com.br Atividades de Internet S.A. and changed its name to Enjoei S.A. in May 2021. Enjoei S.A. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.
General.Address: Alameda Rio Negro, 503, Barueri, SP, Brazil, 06454-000
